description: ![Apple WatchSport]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * We should also emphasise that these projected figures are for the US only –they don’t represent the performance of the Apple Watch in the otherterritories in which it’s available, such as the UK.**Read More:[Apple Watch vs AndroidWear](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/apple-watch-vs-android-wear)**Apple itself hasn’t been forthcoming with information regarding salesperformance of the Apple Watch in these early months, which is why suchmethods have been of interest to investors.Check out our video asking whether the Apple Watch really is the future ofwearables below.
